name: Charlotte Pudding
text:
On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to one cost 2 or greater (Big Mom Pirates) type card and put it into your hand. Then, put the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
Activate: Main: DON!!-1, then rest this Character. Look at the top card of your opponent's deck.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to one cost 2 or greater (Big Mom Pirates) type card and put it into your hand. Then, put the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
DON!!-1, then rest this Character. Look at the top card of your opponent's deck.
